item.title: 在美国信贷紧张之际，全球银行在印度交易上投注数十亿美元
item.description: 在美国信贷损失和贸易紧张局势激怒全球投资者之际，印度银行接连达成数十亿美元的交易，使该国金融业成为全球焦点。【原文：A spate of billion-dollar deals for Indian banks has thrust the country’s financial sector into the global spotlight, at a time when US credit losses and trade tensions have rattled investors globally.】

item.title: 中国将公布第三季度国内生产总值及主要数据
item.description: 照片：Xiao Benxiang/VCG via Getty Images)【原文：Photo by Xiao Benxiang/VCG via Getty Images)】

item.title: Vanguard 为日本央行加息平滑日本收益率曲线做好准备
item.description: Vanguard 资产管理公司（Vanguard Asset Management Ltd.）看淡了日本的政治动荡，如果日本央行今年加息并使该国的债券收益率曲线趋于平缓，该公司就能从中获利。【原文：Vanguard Asset Management Ltd. is looking past the political turmoil in Japan with wagers that stand to profit if the central bank increases interest rates this year and flattens the country’s bond-yield curve.】

item.title: 校长权衡印尼盾波动对印尼债券回流的影响
item.description: 由于政局不稳引发了对财政政策的担忧，信安资产管理公司（Principal Asset Management）的一家基金在抛售了大部分印尼主权债券后，正密切关注印尼盾的走势。【原文：A Principal Asset Management fund is keeping a close eye on the rupiah after selling most of its Indonesian sovereign bonds, as political instability stirred concern over fiscal policy.】

item.title: CATL 盈利谨慎，港股溢价下降
item.description: 在第三季度业绩公布之前，当代安派克斯科技股份有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.’s premium in Hong Kong over its mainland-listed shares is narrowing ahead of third-quarter results, signaling growing caution among global investors toward the battery giant.】

item.title: 新西兰反对党提议在 2026 年大选前设立新的未来基金
item.description: 新西兰主要反对党工党公布了其在 2026 年大选前的第一项重要政策；一项旨在推动投资和经济增长的新政府基金。【原文：New Zealand’s main opposition Labour Party has unveiled its first key policy ahead of the 2026 general election — a new government fund that will aim to drive investment and economic growth.】

item.title: S&P 因预算风险下调法国债券评级，法国债券期货下滑
item.description: 在S&P全球评级公司下调法国主权信用评级后，法国债券期货走低，这一计划外举措凸显了该国的财政困境，并使其债务面临被一些基金强制抛售的风险。【原文：French bonds futures edged lower after S&P Global Ratings downgraded its sovereign credit score, an unscheduled move that highlights the nation’s fiscal woes and places its debt at risk of forced selling by some funds.】

item.title: 日本一进党今日决定与高市自民党结盟
item.description: 日本革新党（Ishin）的议员们将于今天下午召开会议，决定是否与执政党自民党结盟，这很可能导致高市真奈成为该国首位女首相。【原文：Lawmakers in the Japan Innovation Party (Ishin) are set to meet this afternoon to decide whether to form an alliance with the ruling Liberal Democratic Party that would likely lead to Sanae Takaichi becoming the country’s first female prime minister.】

item.title: 韩国的房地产限制措施将推动短期债券上涨
item.description: 韩国地方政府为冷却房地产市场而采取的最新一轮措施刺激了对下月降息的预期，韩国较短期的政府债券有望受到提振。【原文：South Korea’s shorter-maturity government bonds are expected to get a boost as the latest round of measures from local authorities to cool the housing market spur expectations for an interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 交易员关注中美贸易和信贷问题，黄金保持跌势
item.description: 上周五，贵金属大幅下跌，交易员们权衡了贸易紧张局势的最新进展以及围绕美国地区银行信贷敞口的不安情绪，黄金随后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied following a sharp drop for precious metals on Friday, with traders weighing the latest developments in trade tensions as well as jitters surrounding US regional banks’ credit exposure.】

item.title: 零售狂热推动韩国新交易所实现世界级增长
item.description: 韩国的新证券交易所在推出几个月内就占据了全国 2.4 万亿美元市场近三分之一的交易量，凸显了对全天候交易的需求是如何推动爆炸式增长的。【原文：South Korea’s new stock exchange has grabbed nearly a third of activity in the nation’s $2.4 trillion market within a few months of its launch, underscoring how demand for round-the-clock access is fueling explosive growth.】

item.title: 投资者权衡中美贸易，石油在周度下跌后企稳
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了中美贸易紧张局势缓和的迹象，石油在连续第三周下跌后持稳。【原文：Oil was steady after posting a third weekly decline as traders weighed signs of easing trade tensions between the US and China.】

item.title: 安永-帕特农报告称，英国科技行业盈利警告激增
item.description: 咨询公司 EY-Parthenon 的一份报告显示，在英国上市公司中，软件和计算机服务公司上季度利润预警增幅最大。【原文：Software and computer services companies saw the biggest rise in profit warnings among UK-listed firms last quarter, according to a report from consultancy EY-Parthenon.】

item.title: 调查显示：英国住房市场因税收问题错过秋季反弹机会
item.description: 据一份新的报告称，由于人们猜测英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将在下月的预算案中取消房产税，买家暂停了搜索，因此英国房屋卖家在 10 月份几乎没有提高要价。【原文：UK home sellers barely raised their asking prices in October as buyers paused their search amid speculation that Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will lift property taxes at the budget next month, according to a new report.】

item.title: DroneShield 收入因一系列全球防务合同而激增
item.description: 在澳大利亚反无人机系统制造商 DroneShield Ltd. 从多个国家获得一系列合同后，该公司的季度收入飙升。【原文：DroneShield Ltd.’s quarterly revenue soared after the Australian counter-drone systems maker garnered a string of contracts from several nations.】

item.title: 东洋轮胎首席执行官预计利润将超过预期，计划回购股票
item.description: 东洋轮胎公司（Toyo Tire Corp.首席执行官 Takashi Shimizu 预计该轮胎制造商本财年的利润将超过预期，并计划开始回购股票，这得益于美国需求的恢复性增长。【原文：Toyo Tire Corp. Chief Executive Officer Takashi Shimizu expects the tiremaker to exceed its profit guidance this fiscal year and plans to start buying back shares, helped by resilient US demand.】

item.title: 投资者等待总理选举，日本股市期货上涨
item.description: 日本股票期货在周二的投票前走高，这次投票将决定该国的下任首相人选，并为投资者提供清晰的信息。对中美贸易紧张局势担忧的缓解也改善了整体情绪。【原文：Japanese stock futures edged higher ahead of a vote on Tuesday that will determine the country’s next prime minister and provide clarity for investors. Easing concerns over US-China trade tensions also improved the overall sentiment.】

item.title: 中国贸易紧张局势降温，美国股指期货上涨：市场综述
item.description: 美国股票期货在亚洲早盘交易中上涨了 0.3%，此前由于唐纳德-特朗普总统采取行动缓解对贸易紧张局势的担忧，华尔街上周收盘上涨。【原文：US equity futures rose 0.3% in early Asian trading, after Wall Street closed last week higher as President Donald Trump moved to ease concerns over trade tensions.】

item.title: 三一重工寻求最高 16 亿美元在香港上市
item.description: 三一重工股份有限公司（Sany Heavy Industry Co.，简称 "三一重工"）开始接受投资者订单，计划在香港上市融资高达 124 亿港元（合 16 亿美元），加入了大量寻求利用亚洲金融中心热门市场的中国公司的行列。【原文：Sany Heavy Industry Co. started taking investor orders to raise as much as HK$12.4 billion ($1.6 billion) in a Hong Kong listing, joining a flood of Chinese companies seeking to capitalize on the Asian financial hub’s hot market.】

item.title: Kering 同意与欧莱雅合作出售美容部门
item.description: 作为长期战略联盟的一部分，开云集团（Kering SA）同意将其美容部门出售给欧莱雅集团（L'Oreal SA），首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）试图扭转这家法国奢侈品巨头的命运。【原文：Kering SA agreed to sell its beauty division to L’Oreal SA as part of a long-term strategic alliance, with Chief Executive Luca de Meo seeking to turn around the French luxury giant’s fortunes.】

item.title: 货机在香港机场滑入大海，一人失踪
item.description: 香港机场管理局发表声明称，一架从迪拜飞来的货机在香港国际机场降落后立即坠海。【原文：A cargo aircraft traveling from Dubai plunged into the sea immediately after landing at Hong Kong International Airport, according to a statement by Airport Authority Hong Kong.】

item.title: 印度称正缩小与美国在贸易协定争端上的差距
item.description: 印度表示，它正在与美国的贸易谈判中取得扎实进展，希望达成贸易协议并降低惩罚性关税。【原文：India said it’s making solid progress in trade negotiations with the US as it looks to clinch a trade deal and bring down punitive tariffs.】

item.title: 新西兰通胀率达到新西兰央行 1%-3%目标区间的顶点
item.description: 新西兰第三季度通胀加速，已升至储备银行1%-3%目标区间的顶端，即使潜在的价格压力有所减弱，政策制定者也表示将进一步放宽政策。【原文：New Zealand inflation accelerated in the third quarter, pushing to the top of the Reserve Bank’s 1%-3% target band even as underlying price pressures recede and policy makers indicate further easing to come.】

item.title: 国债反弹推动房屋避风港作用，信贷担忧席卷而来
item.description: 只需一波典型的避险买盘，就能唤醒沉睡的国债市场，并将基准收益率推至数月来的最低点。【原文：All it took was a classic bout of haven buying to wake up a slumbering Treasuries market and drive benchmark yields to the lowest in months.】

item.title: 反对党候选人赢得北塞浦路斯总统选举
item.description: 根据最高选举委员会公布的非官方结果，生活在土耳其控制的北部地区的塞浦路斯人在周日举行的投票中选举主张统一分裂岛屿的图凡-埃尔赫曼为总统。【原文：Cypriots living in the Turkish-controlled north elected Tufan Erhurman, an advocate of reunification for the divided island, as president in a vote held on Sunday, according to unofficial results announced by the top election board.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称共同处理俄罗斯资产至关重要
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，只要世界各国齐心协力，她对利用冻结的俄罗斯资产为乌克兰争取资金持开放态度。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde signaled openness to using frozen Russian assets to secure funding for Ukraine as long as countries around the world move in unison.】

item.title: 凯雷首席执行官称信贷是 "担忧名单 "上的一员，但看到了恢复力
item.description: Carlyle Group Inc.的哈维-施瓦茨（Harvey Schwartz）表示，作为该公司的首席执行官，近期信贷市场的波动是他的 "担忧清单 "之一，但到目前为止，他还没有看到任何迹象表明情况正在恶化。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc.’s Harvey Schwartz said recent volatility in credit markets is on his “worry list” as the firm’s chief executive officer, but so far he sees nothing that suggests conditions are deteriorating.】

item.title: 南非在新能源计划中提出核能雄心
item.description: 根据南非电力和能源部长公布的一份新的能源政策蓝图，南非打算重启一项有争议的模块化核反应堆计划，并加强对天然气发电的依赖。【原文：South Africa intends to revive a controversial modular nuclear reactor program and step up its reliance on gas to generate electricity, according to a new energy-policy blueprint unveiled by the nation’s electricity and energy minister.】

item.title: 黄金历史性反弹为新兴市场带来红利
item.description: 黄金价格的持续飙升为整个新兴市场带来了意外之财，提振了开采和购买黄金的国家的投资者信心。【原文：A relentless surge in the price of gold is delivering windfalls across emerging markets, boosting investor confidence in countries that mine and buy the metal.】

item.title: 苹果 M5 产品系列提供多年来最轻微的升级
item.description: 苹果公司的 M5 系列产品采用了全新的芯片—，几乎没有其他吸引普通消费者的地方。此外：公司人工智能部门人才继续流失，苹果公司准备推出触摸屏 MacBook Pro。【原文：Apple’s range of M5 products has a new chip — and little else to entice typical shoppers. Also: The company’s AI division brain drain continues, and Apple gears up to launch a touch-screen MacBook Pro.】
